summary: The diff demonstrates comprehensive implementation of error logging, diagnostics, and public task endpoint verification. REQ-1 and REQ-2 are fully addressed with extensive console logging, query state tracking, and error handling in TasksPage.tsx and task hooks. REQ-3 is addressed with public task query hooks and backend endpoint availability. However, no explicit evidence of error boundary implementation or health check queries is found in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that error boundaries are catching failures
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to error boundary components found in the diff. TasksPage.tsx shows error state handling but no evidence of error boundary component integration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Error boundary catches and displays any runtime errors
missing_requirements.reason: Acceptance criteria requires error boundary to catch and display runtime errors, but no error boundary component modifications are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend canister responds to health check queries
missing_requirements.reason: No health check endpoint implementation or verification found in backend/main.mo modifications.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation click event logging added to AppLayout.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: handleNavClick function logs navigation clicks, but this diagnostic feature was not requested in the BuildRequest.
BuildRequest mentioned publicGetTasks endpoint verification, but the diff shows a new usePublicTasksWithCaptain hook that was not explicitly requested.
